amendment.description: Amendment updates the reference to the final rule by inserting the date the final rule was published in the Federal Register.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 114-216 to update the reference to the final rule and instead of referencing the date it was signed by the Administrator it inserts the date the final rule was published in the Federal Register.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shimkus amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Shimkus.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shimkus amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
